author: Amit S.
title: Landslides in Manang District Block Access to Villages
description: Days of heavy rainfall triggered large landslides in the Annapurna Circuit hiking route region.
content: Landslides estimated over 1 km long have blocked roads in over 5 villages in Manang district after a week of heavy monsoon rains, halting vital food and supply deliveries.

author: Santosh R.
title: WHO Rushes Medical Supplies to Nepal After Earthquake
description: 6.1 earthquake causes over 100 injuries and damage to hospitals in far-western district.
content: A WHO humanitarian relief convoy arrived with urgently needed medicines and medical equipment in Jumla district after yesterday's large earthquake.

author: Suman K.
title: Emergency Airlift Saves Flood Victims in Western Nepal
description: Army helicopters have so far rescued over 500 people stranded for days after severe flooding.
content: The Nepali Army conducted emergency evacuation flights to bring supplies and rescue hundreds stranded in remote villages cutoff by devastating floods last week.
